movie.title: On the Basis of Sex
movie.plot: The true story of Ruth Bader Ginsburg, her struggles for equal rights, and the early cases of a historic career that lead to her nomination and confirmation as U.S. Supreme Court Associate Justice.

events.title: the 10th Circuit court rules in favour of Moritz, represented by Ruth Bader Ginsburg
